tool_description: Matches business shipping requirements to appropriate carrier service levels based on delivery time, cost constraints, and service features.

required_delivery_date.description: Latest acceptable delivery date in YYYY-MM-DD format

max_shipping_cost.description: Maximum acceptable shipping cost in USD

error_messages: Invalid delivery date: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and in the future
Invalid priority factor: Use one of [cost, speed, reliability]
Cost constraint too low: max_shipping_cost must be at least $5.00
Conflicting requirements: No available services match all specified constraints
usage: Specify priority_factor and optionally set required_delivery_date, max_shipping_cost, signature_required, and insurance_required to find matching service levels.

recommended_services.description: List of recommended carrier services matching requirements

match_score.description: Compatibility score between requirements and available services (0-100)

compromise_factors.description: Requirements that may need to be relaxed if no perfect matches
